Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Good service, good selection. Music was maybe a tad too loud. The bagel we had was tasty. A good solid place to stop and have a coffee... Though a little slow getting the coffee :)

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Delicious food. Great atmosphere. Friendly staff. Nice music. All you need after a long day.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text:
Perfect place for window watching, with a hot coffee in your hand, during rainy days.
They have also a therase in front where you can see the boats.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Great location, friendly service, decent bagels if you‚Äôre not used to eating a lot of bagels from NYC or somewhere like that. ‚Ä¶

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Been coming here since I was kid and used to live here. Visited again during my birthday weekend and was overjoyed with the memories. Only sad thing is they didn‚Äôt have my childhood favorite, double chocolate muffin.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Guy making my bagel was sniffing and wiping his nose with his hands while putting the ingredients onto the bagel I ordered. He got cream cheese on his fingers and cleaned his hands on his clothes. No gloves, no hand washing ü§¢yuck

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: A hidden treasure with the best bagels in Amsterdam! Would definitely recommend. You can sit outside next to the canal as well, really great place!

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Probably the best bagels in Amsterdam!  Great staff, very friendly and its great if you can grab a spot outside if it‚Äôs sunny.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: We stopped for a quick afternoon tea; the bagel with Nutella was quite standard, but tasty. Cheap, nice place, cozy, and with vgood service.

Review Text:

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Great place to watch the world go by. My favourite is the BLT with really crunchy bacon. It is really tasty but I think like a few other reviews it's a bit on the expensive side for what you get. But don't let that put you off alone.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Cappuccino like the Italian one, tasty scorn. Nice location and kind staff who knows what's good music.

Review Text: A quiet very cosy place whith friendly staff. They serve excellent coffee and if you are hungry there are many options whith the bagels at the top of the list. Totally recommend this place.

Name: Village Bagels

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Beforehand, I love bagels and have high standards for them. Bagel was okay at best in taste, barely any salmon on there and 1 slice of tomato... and that for 7.70 for a salmon everything bagel. The everything bagel didn't have everything either. And the salmon is for sure not cured in house. People could have made this better at home.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: A quiet very cosy place whith friendly staff. They serve excellent coffee and if you are hungry there are many options whith the bagels at the top of the list. Totally recommend this place.

Name: Village Bagels

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Friendly people who make good bagels.you can have anything from peanut butter and jam to salmon and cream cheese. All yummy! Conveniently located in the center and close to the hotels.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Ah! Forget what you know about bagels and try this. Visited Amsterdam for 3 nights and ate here everyday ‚Äì couldn't resist. Fresh produce, interesting combinations and great variety of bagels. Try the chicken and avocado w. sesame bagels, or the pastrami with mustard sauce. Service was also good. Nice to sit outside when it's sunny.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Staff was rude, service horrible. I was shocked when I saw them making faces when we changed our order .Absolutely unacceptable. We will never go back there.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: You are really a beautiful meeting!üëç

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Generic "hip" place. Bagels are prepared without any passion and too expensive for what you get. Hummus tastes exactly like the one from Albert Heijn, something I wouldn't expect.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Decent bagels and coffee, also very centrally located. However for what you pay, what you get isn‚Äôt the best value - there are better tasting ones out there for similar prices.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Sorry but this is a messy place. Bagels taste old and the girls never wash there hands when handling food after cleaning the floor, wiping their hair, doing the washing up or moving bins and boxes. Terrible Bagels and all over priced. And slow service. So in my view...keep clear away.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Great little coffee/bagel shop. Not over touristy. The food is good and the coffee as well. Their coffee is not the most consistent (a latte and cappucino had the same amount of foam).

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Great place with little tourist. Tried the cream cheese with strawberry jam bagel and a cup of coffee. Small but cozy place, with a very nice staff, but it gets really hot during spring.  Anyway, I do recommend.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Bagels are ok. But the service is super slow. If the place is half full you might be waiting for 30 for your coffee and bagel to come out. Needs some efficiency boosting.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Really tasty bagels, good espresso, chill vibe, and a good place to get some work done while people outside strut along one of the busier crossings in Amsterdam!

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: A good place to stop off and grab something to eat and drink some coffee. The music is soothing and the overall ambiance gezellig, as the Dutch would put it. In my opinion, perhaps a bit overpriced.

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: A variery of fresh bagels, tasty combinations and wonderful staff. A great breakfast experience if you're looking for a good quick bite

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text: Friendly service, nice latte. Muffins were ok, will try the bagels next time. Nice place to chill out away from the normal tourist spots

Name: Village Bagels
Review Text:

Review Text: We are from Melbourne Australia where the cafe scene is impeccable.  I really enjoyed my early morning meal here everyday. Great work guys!!

Name: Village Bagels
